description: ROCKY HILL, Conn. (AP) _ The winning numbers in Monday afternoon's drawing of the Connecticut Lottery's "Play3 Day" game were: 4-4-8 (four, four, eight)
title: Winning numbers drawn in 'Play3 Day' game
title_page: Winning numbers drawn in 'Play3 Day' game
maintext:
ROCKY HILL, Conn. (AP) _ The winning numbers in Monday afternoon’s drawing of the Connecticut Lottery’s “Play3 Day” game were:
4-4-8
(four, four, eight)
